nodes.text: The Duros known as Beadle Lubboon was known to have a mother. This female Duros was the wife of Lubboon and lived with her family in Xakrea, the largest city on Darkknell. She lived during the Republic Dark Age when the planet Darkknell was the capital of the Daimanate, a Sith princedom ruled by the Sith Lord Daiman. She dotted over her son Beadle.

Like her husband, she wanted a better life for her son Beadle. In 1032 BBY, the mercenary Brigadier Jarrow Rusher visited their shop to purchase spare parts for their ship Diligence. In exchange, Beadle Lubboon was recruited by Rusher's Brigade where he became a Trooper.
